name: Clementine Peppercorn Glaze
recipeYield: 1 3/4 cups, enough for a whole ham
keywords: brown sugar, clementines, red peppercorns, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 clementines, stemmed if necessary, quartered, skin left on
2 fresh green serrano chilies or 1 jalapeño chili, stemmed, seeded and coarsely chopped
1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon crushed red peppercorns or peppercorn blend
1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, preferably freshly ground

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a food processor and pulse until chilies are reduced to tiny green flecks. Transfer to a jar with a tight-fitting lid and store in refrigerator until needed. Making glaze a day in advance allows flavors to bloom and thickens glaze, which makes it easier to apply.
